feature1.explanation: Both texts contain informal writing styles with the use of dashes and informal language.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and word patterns indicative of the same author.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts show similarities in complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: The narrative styles and tone in both texts suggest a shared authorship.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation, lexical choices, sentence structures, narrative styles, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is relatively high.
